title: Mohammed Alshaghathirah
text:
Hello! I’m Mohammed Alshaghathirah, a graduate student pursuing a Master of Quantitative Finance at UC San Diego.
I have a strong background in procurement, sales, and administrative coordination, with experience across both the retail and e-commerce sectors. I’m passionate about financial data analysis, business operations, and using technology to drive smart decision-making.





September 2015 – September 2017
- Helped organize events including Saudi National Day.
- Led a team of Saudi students at international festivals.



April 2020 – January 2023
- Managed advertising campaigns through social media.
- Built strong supplier and customer relationships.
- Analyzed marketing and merchandising performance.
- Sold coffee to local coffee shops and restaurants.
- Sourced products and negotiated supplier deals.



January 2023 – September 2024
- Oversaw full supply chain operations.
- Ensured timely flow of goods from suppliers to retailers.
- Managed sales department operations.
- Handled food redistribution to markets and hypermarkets.






Native Arabic

Fluent English






MS Office, Google Drive, Email

Data Analysis, Time Management

Problem-Solving, Communication


Thank you for visiting my website! Feel free to check out my Projects to see my academic work and personal data projects.
